name: Eurodistrict PAMINA
membership: Association of European Border Regions, Mission Opérationnelle Transfrontalière
goal: Promotion, support and coordination of cross-border cooperation in the Eurodistrict PAMINA (Southern Palatinate, Middle Upper Rhine, Northern Alsace)
interests: Consumers, Culture, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Public Health, Regional Policy, Single market, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
- Communication "Boosting growth and cohesion in EU border regions" -> Overcoming legal and/or administrative obstacles in border regions
- Study on missing cross-border railroad links
- INTERREG A and EFSI
